dataList.name: Keen Strike
dataList.desc: On Hit, inflict 1 Bleed (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Brutal Stab
dataList.desc: Inflict +1 more Bleed when an Attack Skill inflicts Bleed

dataList.name: Clean Up
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, gain 1 Skill Slot next turn (Can have up to 5 Slots max)
